[User Question]
Find items with the highest shipment unit price per supplier.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, MAX(rsl.shipment_unit_price) AS max_price FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description)

[User Question]
get item wise purchases from purchase order not necessarily received Calculate total purchase for item AS54888

SELECT 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END AS item_segment1,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END AS item_description,
    SUM (
        pl.unit_price
        * COALESCE(h.rate, 1)
        * COALESCE(pd.quantity_ordered, 0)
    ) AS total_purchase
FROM po_distributions_all pd
JOIN po_lines_all pl ON pl.po_line_id = pd.po_line_id
JOIN po_headers_all h ON pl.po_header_id = h.po_header_id AND h.TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'
LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b m ON pd.destination_organization_id = m.organization_id
                                AND pl.item_id = m.inventory_item_id
WHERE 
    pl.item_description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.description LIKE '%AS54888%'
    OR m.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%'
GROUP BY 
    CASE WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL THEN m.segment1 ELSE NULL END,
    CASE
        WHEN pl.item_id IS NOT NULL AND m.description IS NOT NULL THEN m.description
        ELSE pl.item_description
    END
ORDER BY total_purchase DESC

[User Question]
Find top 5 items by total PO amount (unit price  quantity).*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(pla.unit_price * pla.quantity) AS total_value FROM po_lines_all pla LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) ORDER BY total_value DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
give me the list of invoices giving the aging bucket of their approvals delays

WITH approval_data
     AS (SELECT ai.invoice_id,
                ai.invoice_num,
                ai.invoice_date,
                aps.vendor_name,
                ah.iteration,
                ah.response,
                ah.creation_date AS response_date,
                RANK ()
                OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration
                      ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id)
                   AS rn_first,
                RANK ()
                OVER (PARTITION BY ah.invoice_id, ah.iteration
                      ORDER BY ah.approval_history_id DESC)
                   AS rn_last
           FROM ap_invoices_all ai
                JOIN ap_suppliers aps
                   ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
                JOIN ap_inv_aprvl_hist_all ah
                   ON ai.invoice_id = ah.invoice_id
          WHERE 1 = 1),
     submission_dates
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MIN (response_date) AS submitted_date
             FROM approval_data
            WHERE response NOT IN
                     ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED')
         GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration),
     approval_dates
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, iteration, MAX (response_date) AS approved_date
             FROM approval_data
            WHERE response IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED')
         GROUP BY invoice_id, iteration),
     latest_iterations
     AS (  SELECT invoice_id, MAX (iteration) AS latest_iteration
             FROM approval_data
         GROUP BY invoice_id),
     final_data
     AS (SELECT s.invoice_id,
                ai.invoice_num,
                ai.invoice_date,
                aps.vendor_name,
                s.iteration,
                s.submitted_date,
                a.approved_date,
                CASE
                   WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL
                   THEN
                      a.approved_date - s.submitted_date
                   ELSE
                      CURRENT_DATE - s.submitted_date
                END
                   AS days_taken,
                CASE
                   WHEN a.approved_date IS NOT NULL THEN 'Approved'
                   ELSE 'Pending or Withdrawn'
                END
                   AS approval_status,
                l.latest_iteration
           FROM submission_dates s
                LEFT JOIN approval_dates a
                   ON     s.invoice_id = a.invoice_id
                      AND s.iteration = a.iteration
                JOIN latest_iterations l
                   ON s.invoice_id = l.invoice_id
                JOIN ap_invoices_all ai
                   ON s.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id
                JOIN ap_suppliers aps
                   ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id)
  SELECT invoice_num,
         invoice_date,
         vendor_name,
         iteration,
         invoice_id,
         submitted_date,
         approved_date,
         days_taken,
         approval_status
    FROM final_data
   WHERE    (approved_date IS NOT NULL AND days_taken > 0)
         OR (    approved_date IS NULL
             AND iteration = latest_iteration
             AND days_taken > 0)
ORDER BY submitted_date DESC

[User Question]
Find top 10 overdue invoices by dollar value under Vision Operations */

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, aps.DUE_DATE, aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0 AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' ORDER BY aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
Find count of invoices under 'Vision Operations' by payment terms */

SELECT t.NAME AS TERMS_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT i.INVOICE_ID) AS INVOICE_COUNT FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all d JOIN ap_invoices_all i ON d.INVOICE_ID = i.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON i.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID JOIN ap_terms t ON i.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY t.NAME

[User Question]
Retrieve POs and suppliers where average delivered quantity per transaction exceeds 500 units.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, AVG(rct.quantity) AS avg_delivered_qty FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'DELIVER' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING AVG(rct.quantity) > 500

[User Question]
can you give me month wise opening balance, movement and  closing balance only between mar 08 and apr 08 for all expense accounts at department segment level for ledger id 1

WITH period_movement AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS period, GCC.segment2 AS department_segment, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance, SUM(NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS movement_in_accounting_period, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances BAL JOIN gl_code_combinations GCC ON BAL.code_combination_id = GCC.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS LED ON BAL.LEDGER_ID = LED.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS GP ON BAL.PERIOD_NAME = GP.PERIOD_NAME AND GP.period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND GP.period_type = LED.accounted_period_type WHERE LED.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND GCC.account_type = 'E' AND GP.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND GP.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Apr-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND BAL.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND BAL.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND BAL.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND BAL.CURRENCY_CODE = LED.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), GCC.segment2 /* segment1 fro company ,segment2 for department,segment5 for product,segment4 for sub account  etc.,*/ ) SELECT department_segment, MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN opening_balance END) AS "Mar-08 Opening", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN movement_in_accounting_period END) AS "Mar-08 Movement", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN closing_balance END) AS "Mar-08 Closing", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN opening_balance END) AS "Apr-08 Opening", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN movement_in_accounting_period END) AS "Apr-08 Movement", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN closing_balance END) AS "Apr-08 Closing" FROM period_movement GROUP BY department_segment ORDER BY department_segment

[User Question]
Get POs and item codes where the PO revision number is between 1 and 3 and the vendor is active.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.revision_num FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pha.revision_num BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND aps.vendor_type_lookup_code = 'ACTIVE'

[User Question]
Find suppliers and PO numbers where PO distributions have more than 2 different accrual statuses using GROUP BY.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT pod.ACCRUED_FLAG) AS accrual_statuses FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON pha.po_header_id = pod.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT pod.ACCRUED_FLAG) > 2

[User Question]
List suppliers and total PO count where destination type is 'SHOP FLOOR'.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT pha.po_header_id) AS po_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'SHOP FLOOR' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
give me list recepits that are returned to staging but not returned to vendor

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date AS po_date, pla.line_num AS po_line_number, pla.item_id, msi.segment1 AS item_code, msi.description AS item_description, pda.distribution_num, NVL(rt_stagging.received_qty, 0) AS quantity_received, NVL(rt_vendor.delivered_qty, 0) AS quantity_delivered, (NVL(rt_stagging.received_qty, 0) - NVL(rt_vendor.delivered_qty, 0)) AS quantity_pending_delivery FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = pda.destination_organization_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT po_distribution_id, SUM(quantity) AS received_qty FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' GROUP BY po_distribution_id) rt_stagging ON rt_stagging.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT po_distribution_id, SUM(quantity) AS delivered_qty FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' GROUP BY po_distribution_id) rt_vendor ON rt_vendor.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id WHERE (NVL(rt_stagging.received_qty, 0) - NVL(rt_vendor.delivered_qty, 0)) > 0 ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, aps.PAYMENT_NUM, aps.DUE_DATE, aip.CREATION_DATE AS PAYMENT_DATE, aip.AMOUNT, aca.CHECK_NUMBER, (aps.DUE_DATE - aip.CREATION_DATE) AS DAYS_EARLY FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aps.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID AND aps.PAYMENT_NUM = aip.PAYMENT_NUM JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aip.CREATION_DATE < aps.DUE_DATE AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'

[User Question]
TO GET THE LIST OF ACCOUNTS UNDER A PARENT ACCOUNT  WHEN PARENT VALUE AND LEDGER AND MONTH IS SPECIFIED

WITH AccountHierarchy AS ( SELECT FLEX_VALUE AS ACCOUNT_CODE, DESCRIPTION AS ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, PARENT_FLEX_VALUE AS PARENT_ACCOUNT_CODE FROM FND_FLEX_VALUE_CHILDREN_V WHERE FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = ( SELECT FIS.FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID FROM FND_ID_FLEX_STRUCTURES FFS JOIN GL_LEDGERS GLL ON GLL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNTS_ID = FFS.id_flex_num JOIN FND_ID_FLEX_SEGMENTS FIS ON FIS.ID_FLEX_NUM = FFS.ID_FLEX_NUM AND FIS.ID_FLEX_CODE = FFS.ID_FLEX_CODE AND FIS.APPLICATION_ID = FFS.APPLICATION_ID WHERE 1=1 /* FFS.ID_FLEX_NUM = 101 */ AND FFS.ID_FLEX_CODE = 'GL#' AND FFS.APPLICATION_ID = 101 AND FIS.SEGMENT_NAME = 'Account' AND GLL.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)'  /*Parameter for Ledger Name*/ ) START WITH PARENT_FLEX_VALUE = 'PT'  /* Parameter for Parent Account */ CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR FLEX_VALUE = PARENT_FLEX_VALUE AND PRIOR FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID = FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID ), Balances AS ( SELECT gcc.segment3 AS account, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) AS account_desc, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0)) AS debit, SUM(NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS credit, SUM(NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(bal.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances bal JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS led ON bal.LEDGER_ID = led.LEDGER_ID and led.chart_of_accounts_id = gcc.chart_of_accounts_id JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON bal.PERIOD_NAME = gp.PERIOD_NAME AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type and gp.period_year = bal.period_year and gp.period_num= bal.period_num and gp.period_type = bal.period_type WHERE 1=1 and led.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)'  /* Parameter for Ledger Name */ AND gp.PERIOD_NAME = 'Mar-08' /* Parameter for Period Name */ AND bal.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND bal.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND bal.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND bal.CURRENCY_CODE = led.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY gcc.segment3, gl_flexfields_pkg.get_description_sql(led.chart_of_accounts_id, 3, gcc.segment3) order by gcc.segment3 ) SELECT   /* Ensures unique rows */ b.account, b.account_desc, NVL(b.opening_balance, 0) AS opening_balance, NVL(b.debit, 0) AS debit, NVL(b.credit, 0) AS credit, NVL(b.closing_balance, 0) AS closing_balance FROM Balances b JOIN AccountHierarchy ah ON b.account = ah.ACCOUNT_CODE ORDER BY b.account

SELECT i.INVOICE_NUM, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, g.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, t.NAME AS TERMS_NAME FROM ap_invoices_all i JOIN ap_suppliers s ON i.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all ss ON i.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID JOIN gl_ledgers g ON i.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = g.LEDGER_ID JOIN ap_terms t ON i.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID WHERE i.APPROVAL_STATUS = 'APPROVED'

[User Question]
Find invoices under 'Vision Operations' with total distribution amount mismatch */

SELECT i.INVOICE_NUM, i.INVOICE_AMOUNT, SUM(d.AMOUNT) AS DISTRIBUTION_TOTAL FROM ap_invoices_all i JOIN ap_invoice_distributions_all d ON i.INVOICE_ID = d.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON i.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY i.INVOICE_NUM, i.INVOICE_AMOUNT HAVING SUM(d.AMOUNT) <> i.INVOICE_AMOUNT

[User Question]
give the list of items purchased in Jan 07 where the price is over the same items previous purchase before jan 07

SELECT pol.item_id, pol.item_description, poh.po_header_id, poh.segment1 AS po_number, poh.creation_date AS purchase_date, pol.unit_price AS current_price, prev_pol.unit_price AS previous_price, poh.vendor_id, poh.approved_flag FROM po_headers_all poh JOIN po_lines_all pol ON poh.po_header_id = pol.po_header_id JOIN (SELECT pol1.item_id, pol1.unit_price, pol1.po_header_id, poh1.creation_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pol1.item_id ORDER BY poh1.creation_date DESC) AS rn FROM po_headers_all poh1 JOIN po_lines_all pol1 ON poh1.po_header_id = pol1.po_header_id WHERE poh1.approved_flag = 'Y' AND poh1.creation_date < DATE '2007-01-01' ) prev_pol ON pol.item_id = prev_pol.item_id AND prev_pol.rn = 1 WHERE poh.approved_flag = 'Y' AND poh.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-01-31' AND pol.unit_price > prev_pol.unit_price ORDER BY pol.item_id, poh.creation_date;/*note: unless otherwise specified in question, purchase amount is always in local currency only it has arrived at by unit_price* rate* rate column in po headers*/

[User Question]
Retrieve POs and suppliers where at least one item has more than 3 different lot numbers across shipments.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, COUNT(DISTINCT rsl.vendor_lot_num) AS lot_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON rsh.shipment_header_id = rsl.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rsl.vendor_lot_num IS NOT NULL GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rsl.vendor_lot_num) > 3

[User Question]
Calculate days between invoice creation and cleared payment for Vision Operations */

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.CREATION_DATE AS INVOICE_DATE, aca.CHECK_DATE, aca.CHECK_NUMBER, (aca.CHECK_DATE - ai.CREATION_DATE) AS DAYS_TO_CLEAR FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'

[User Question]
can you give me month wise opening balance, movement and  closing balance only between mar 08 and apr 08 for all expense accounts at department segment level for ledger id 1

WITH period_movement AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS period, GCC.segment2 AS department_segment, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0)) AS opening_balance, SUM(NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS movement_in_accounting_period, SUM(NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.BEGIN_BALANCE_CR, 0) + NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS closing_balance FROM gl_balances BAL JOIN gl_code_combinations GCC ON BAL.code_combination_id = GCC.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS LED ON BAL.LEDGER_ID = LED.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS GP ON BAL.PERIOD_NAME = GP.PERIOD_NAME AND GP.period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND GP.period_type = LED.accounted_period_type WHERE LED.LEDGER_ID = 1 AND GCC.account_type = 'E' AND GP.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND GP.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Apr-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND BAL.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND BAL.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND BAL.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL AND BAL.CURRENCY_CODE = LED.CURRENCY_CODE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'), GCC.segment2 /* segment1 fro company ,segment2 for department,segment5 for product,segment4 for sub account  etc.,*/ ) SELECT department_segment, MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN opening_balance END) AS "Mar-08 Opening", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN movement_in_accounting_period END) AS "Mar-08 Movement", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-03' THEN closing_balance END) AS "Mar-08 Closing", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN opening_balance END) AS "Apr-08 Opening", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN movement_in_accounting_period END) AS "Apr-08 Movement", MAX(CASE WHEN period = '2008-04' THEN closing_balance END) AS "Apr-08 Closing" FROM period_movement GROUP BY department_segment ORDER BY department_segment

[User Question]
Retrieve items and POs where received quantity equals ordered quantity (fully received).*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(rsl.quantity_received) AS received_qty, pla.quantity AS ordered_qty FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON pla.po_line_id = rsl.po_line_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description), pla.quantity HAVING SUM(rsl.quantity_received) = pla.quantity

give me top 10 vendors for AS54888, show total purchased value

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT v.vendor_name, SUM(CASE WHEN l.line_type_id = 1 AND d.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY' THEN l.unit_price * nvl(h.rate, 1) * d.quantity_ordered ELSE nvl(h.rate, 1) * d.amount_ordered END) AS total_purchased_value FROM po_headers_all h JOIN po_lines_all l ON h.po_header_id = l.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all d ON l.po_line_id = d.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers v ON h.vendor_id = v.vendor_id left JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON l.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND d.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE msi.segment1 LIKE '%AS54888%' OR msi.description LIKE '%AS54888%' GROUP BY v.vendor_name ORDER BY total_purchased_value DESC  ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

[User Question]
Get suppliers and total PO line quantities where item revision is not null.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, SUM(pla.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pla.item_revision IS NOT NULL GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

List suppliers and total PO count where destination type is 'SHOP FLOOR'.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT pha.po_header_id) AS po_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'SHOP FLOOR' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers and suppliers where the average unit price for received items is below 50 using AVG.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, AVG(rct.po_unit_price) AS avg_unit_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING AVG(rct.po_unit_price) < 50

[User Question]
give me month wise period movement actuals for ACCOUNT 7360 for ledger Vision Operations (USA) between jan 2008 and mar 2008 along with growth month on month

WITH period_movement AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS period, SUM(NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_DR, 0) - NVL(BAL.PERIOD_NET_CR, 0)) AS movement_in_accounting_period FROM gl_balances BAL JOIN gl_code_combinations GCC ON BAL.code_combination_id = GCC.code_combination_id JOIN GL_LEDGERS LED ON BAL.LEDGER_ID = LED.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS GP ON BAL.PERIOD_NAME = GP.PERIOD_NAME AND GP.period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND GP.period_type = LED.accounted_period_type WHERE GCC.segment3 = '7360' AND LED.NAME = 'Vision Operations (USA)' AND GP.START_DATE >= (SELECT start_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Jan-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND GP.END_DATE <= (SELECT end_date FROM gl_periods WHERE period_name = 'Mar-08' AND period_set_name = LED.period_set_name AND period_type = LED.accounted_period_type) AND BAL.ACTUAL_FLAG = 'A' AND BAL.TEMPLATE_ID IS NULL AND BAL.TRANSLATED_FLAG IS NULL and bal.currency_code = led.currency_code GROUP BY TO_CHAR(GP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ) SELECT period, movement_in_accounting_period, (movement_in_accounting_period - LAG(movement_in_accounting_period) OVER (ORDER BY period)) / NULLIF(LAG(movement_in_accounting_period) OVER (ORDER BY period), 0) * 100 AS month_on_month_growth FROM period_movement ORDER BY period

[User Question]
Give me closing balances for Jan and June 2003 along with the growth percentage for vision operations ledger showing the list of accounts that have grown by more than 5% between the above months. Include only expense accounts

WITH closing_balances AS (
    SELECT
        gcc.segment3                                                                                                             AS account
        ,
        SUM(nvl(bal.begin_balance_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.begin_balance_cr, 0) + nvl(bal.period_net_dr, 0) - nvl(bal.period_net_cr, 0)) AS closing_balance
    FROM
             gl_balances bal
        JOIN gl_code_combinations gcc ON bal.code_combination_id = gcc.code_combination_id
        JOIN gl_ledgers           led ON bal.ledger_id = led.ledger_id
        JOIN gl_periods           gp ON bal.period_name = gp.period_name
                              AND gp.period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                              AND gp.period_type = led.accounted_period_type
    WHERE
            led.name = 'Vision Operations (USA)'
        AND gp.start_date IN ( (
            SELECT
                start_date
            FROM
                gl_periods
            WHERE
                    period_name = 'Jan-03'
                AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type
        ), (
            SELECT
                start_date
            FROM
                gl_periods
            WHERE
                    period_name = 'Jun-03'
                AND period_set_name = led.period_set_name
                AND period_type = led.accounted_period_type
        ) )
        AND gcc.account_type = 'E'
        AND bal.actual_flag = 'A'
        AND bal.template_id IS NULL
        AND bal.translated_flag IS NULL
        AND bal.currency_code = led.currency_code
    GROUP BY
        gcc.segment3
), growth_data AS (
    SELECT
        account, closing_balance,
        ( closing_balance - LAG(closing_balance)
                            OVER(PARTITION BY account
                                 ORDER BY
                                     account
        ) ) / nullif(
            abs(LAG(closing_balance)
                OVER(PARTITION BY account
                     ORDER BY
                         account
            )),
            0
        ) * 100 AS growth_percentage
    FROM
        closing_balances
)
SELECT
    account,
    closing_balance,
    growth_percentage
FROM
    growth_data
WHERE
    growth_percentage > 5
ORDER BY
    account;

Retrieve POs and suppliers where PO distributions have null code_combination_id using EXISTS.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM po_distributions_all pod WHERE pod.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id AND pod.code_combination_id IS NULL )

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers and supplier names where the total number of containers across shipments is at least 20.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, SUM(rsh.num_of_containers) AS total_containers FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING SUM(rsh.num_of_containers) >= 20

[User Question]
Find suppliers and PO lines where the items unit of measure conversion rate to primary unit os measure is above 1.5.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, muc.conversion_rate FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON muc.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE muc.conversion_rate > 1.5

[User Question]
List suppliers and POs where the same PO has both 'INVENTORY' and 'EXPENSE' destination types.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.destination_type_code IN ('INVENTORY', 'EXPENSE') GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rct.destination_type_code) = 2

List suppliers and POs where quantity returned exceeds quantity received for any line (over-return case).*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsl.shipment_line_id FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON pha.po_header_id = rsl.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM rcv_transactions WHERE shipment_line_id = rsl.shipment_line_id AND transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER') > (SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM rcv_transactions WHERE shipment_line_id = rsl.shipment_line_id AND transaction_type = 'RECEIVE')

[User Question]
give the list of items purchased in jan07 to dec 07 that is purchased frequently atleast once or twice a month consider one purchase order as one purchase approved purchaes orders only give months in separate columns

WITH purchase_data AS ( SELECT pol.item_id, pol.item_description, poh.segment1 AS po_number, poh.creation_date AS purchase_date, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(poh.creation_date, 'MM')) AS purchase_month, TO_CHAR(poh.creation_date, 'YYYY') AS purchase_year FROM po_headers_all poh JOIN po_lines_all pol ON poh.po_header_id = pol.po_header_id WHERE poh.approved_flag = 'Y' AND poh.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-12-31' ), monthly_purchase_count AS ( SELECT item_id, item_description, purchase_month, COUNT(DISTINCT po_number) AS purchase_count /*Count distinct POs*/ FROM purchase_data GROUP BY item_id, item_description, purchase_month ), frequent_items AS ( SELECT item_id, item_description, purchase_month, purchase_count FROM monthly_purchase_count WHERE purchase_count >= 1 ) SELECT item_id, item_description, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 1 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jan, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 2 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Feb, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 3 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Mar, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 4 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Apr, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 5 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS May, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 6 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jun, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 7 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jul, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 8 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Aug, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 9 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Sep, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 10 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Oct, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 11 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Nov, SUM(CASE WHEN purchase_month = 12 THEN purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Dec FROM frequent_items GROUP BY item_id, item_description ORDER BY item_id

[User Question]
List all items that have been returned to supplier along with PO and supplier details.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        aps.vendor_name,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        rct.quantity AS returned_quantity FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_headers_all pha     ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps     ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi     ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id    AND rct.organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER'

[User Question]
Retrieve purchase orders and items where the PO unit price is different from the price captured at the time of receipt.

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number,        aps.vendor_name,        msi.segment1 AS item_code,        pla.unit_price AS po_unit_price,        rct.po_unit_price AS receipt_price   FROM po_headers_all pha        JOIN po_lines_all pla           ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id        JOIN ap_suppliers aps           ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id        JOIN rcv_transactions rct           ON pla.po_line_id = rct.po_line_id        JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi           ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id              AND RCT.orgANIZATION_id = msi.organization_id  WHERE pla.unit_price <> rct.po_unit_price

[User Question]
how to get chart of account structure of a given ledger as each account will have multiple segments

WITH QualifierData AS ( SELECT fifs.id_flex_num AS chart_of_accounts_id, fifs.ID_FLEX_STRUCTURE_CODE AS chart_of_accounts_name, SAV.APPLICATION_COLUMN_NAME, fifs.id_flex_code, fifs.application_id, fics.segment_num, fics.segment_name, fics.flex_value_set_id, fvs.flex_value_set_name, GLL.LEDGER_ID, SAV.SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE, COUNT(CASE WHEN SAV.SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE != 'GL_GLOBAL' THEN 1 END) OVER (PARTITION BY fifs.id_flex_num, fics.segment_num) AS NonGlobalCount  /* Count of non-GL_GLOBAL qualifiers*/ FROM fnd_id_flex_structures fifs JOIN fnd_id_flex_segments fics ON fifs.id_flex_num = fics.id_flex_num JOIN fnd_flex_value_sets fvs ON fics.flex_value_set_id = fvs.flex_value_set_id JOIN fnd_segment_attribute_values sav ON fifs.application_id = sav.application_id AND SAV.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE = 'Y' AND fifs.id_flex_code = sav.id_flex_code AND fics.application_column_name = sav.application_column_name AND fics.id_flex_num = sav.id_flex_num AND fics.id_flex_code = sav.id_flex_code JOIN gl_ledgers gll ON fifs.id_flex_num = gll.chart_of_accounts_id WHERE fifs.id_flex_code = 'GL#'  /* Only General Ledger COA */ AND fifs.application_id = 101  /* Application ID filter */ AND gll.ledger_id = 1 ) SELECT * FROM QualifierData WHERE /* Keep only GL_GLOBAL if no other qualifiers exist*/ NOT (SEGMENT_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE = 'GL_GLOBAL' AND NonGlobalCount > 0) ORDER BY chart_of_accounts_id, segment_num

[User Question]
Give the purchase order details covering po header information like po number (segment1), creation_date( po_date) vendor name vendor site code, item code, item description,qty,unit_rate,  need by date, promise date  PO Headers to Lines, Line Locations, Distributions with full supplier and item context, current quantities received, billed etc for last one month

SELECT ph.segment1 AS po_number,
       ph.creation_date AS po_date,ph.currency_code po_currency,
       aps.vendor_name,
       apsa.vendor_site_code,
       pl.line_num,
       pl.item_id,
       pl.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE transaction_uom,
       pl.quantity qty_tran_uom,
       pl.item_description purchase_line_description,
       msi.segment1 AS item_code,
       msi.description AS item_description,
       msi.primary_uom_code,
       pll.line_location_id,
           pll.QUANTITY as "loc_qty_order_todate",
      pll.QUANTITY_RECEIVED  as"loc_qty_rec_todate",
     pll.QUANTITY_CANCELLED as "loc_qty_cancel_todate",
     pll.QUANTITY_BILLED as "loc_qty_billed_todate",
     pll.NEED_BY_DATE  ,
      pll.PROMISED_DATE,
       pd.po_distribution_id,
       pd.quantity_ordered,
       hou.name AS operating_unit,
       pd.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID,
pd.CODE_COMBINATION_ID,
pd.QUANTITY_ORDERED dist_qty_order,
pd.QUANTITY_DELIVERED dist_qty_deliver_todate,
pd.QUANTITY_BILLED dis_qty_billed_todate,
pd.QUANTITY_CANCELLED dist_cancel_todate,
pd.REQ_DISTRIBUTION_ID ,
pd.AMOUNT_BILLED,
pd.DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE,
pd.DESTINATION_ORGANIZATION_ID,
pd.DESTINATION_SUBINVENTORY,
pd.distribution_num,
pd.distribution_type,
       ood.organization_code AS inventory_org_code,
       gl.name AS ledger_name
  FROM po_headers_all ph
       JOIN po_lines_all pl
          ON ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id
       JOIN po_line_locations_all pll
          ON pl.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id
       JOIN po_distributions_all pd
          ON pll.line_location_id = pd.line_location_id
       LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps
          ON ph.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id
       LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all apsa
          ON ph.vendor_site_id = apsa.vendor_site_id
       LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi
          ON     pl.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id
             AND pd.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou
          ON ph.org_id = hou.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN org_organization_definitions ood
          ON pd.destination_organization_id = ood.organization_id
       LEFT JOIN gl_ledgers gl
          ON hou.set_of_books_id = gl.ledger_id
          where ph.creation_date > sysdate-30

[User Question]
List POs where goods are still pending full delivery (received quantity less than ordered quantity).*/

SELECT      pha.segment1 AS po_number,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE,     SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) AS net_received_qty,     SUM(plA.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty FROM      po_headers_all pha     JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id         JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS HR         ON HR.ORGANIZATION_ID = PHA.ORG_ID         AND UPPER(HR.NAME) LIKE  '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'     JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id     JOIN po_distributions_all pod          ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id     JOIN rcv_transactions rct          ON pod.po_distribution_id = rct.po_distribution_id     JOIN ap_suppliers aps          ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id     LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id          AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE      rct.transaction_date < TO_DATE('2007-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY      pha.segment1,     aps.vendor_name,     NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description),     pha.po_header_id,     pla.po_line_id,     PLA.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE HAVING      SUM(         CASE              WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' THEN rct.quantity             WHEN rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' THEN -1 * rct.quantity             ELSE 0         END     ) < SUM(plA.quantity)

get the prepayments applied against an invoice

SELECT STD_AI.INVOICE_ID, std_ai.INVOICE_NUM AS STANDARD_INVOICE_NUM, std_ai.INVOICE_DATE AS STANDARD_INVOICE_DATE, std_ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT AS STANDARD_INVOICE_AMOUNT, std_ai.VENDOR_ID AS VENDOR_ID, s.VENDOR_NAME AS VENDOR_NAME, pre_ai.INVOICE_NUM AS PREPAYMENT_INVOICE_NUM, pre_ai.INVOICE_DATE AS PREPAYMENT_INVOICE_DATE, pre_ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT AS PREPAYMENT_INVOICE_AMOUNT, SUM (aid.AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_ADJUSTED_AMOUNT FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all aid JOIN ap_invoices_all std_ai ON aid.INVOICE_ID = std_ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_distributions_all prepay_dist ON aid.PREPAY_DISTRIBUTION_ID = prepay_dist.INVOICE_DISTRIBUTION_ID JOIN ap_invoices_all pre_ai ON prepay_dist.INVOICE_ID = pre_ai.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_suppliers s ON std_ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID WHERE     std_ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE IN ('STANDARD', 'EXPENSE REPORT') AND aid.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAY' AND pre_ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'PREPAYMENT' GROUP BY STD_AI.INVOICE_ID, std_ai.INVOICE_NUM, std_ai.INVOICE_DATE, std_ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, std_ai.VENDOR_ID, s.VENDOR_NAME, pre_ai.INVOICE_NUM, pre_ai.INVOICE_DATE, pre_ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT

[User Question]
List suppliers and PO numbers where average PO unit price exceeds 5000 using GROUP BY and HAVING.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, AVG(rct.po_unit_price) AS avg_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING AVG(rct.po_unit_price) > 5000

[User Question]
recurring puchases of same item from same vendor more than 2 times in a month in 2007

SELECT pol.item_id, pol.item_description, poh.vendor_id, aps.vendor_name, count(*) FROM po_headers_all poh JOIN po_lines_all pol ON poh.po_header_id = pol.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON poh.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE 1=1 and poh.approved_flag = 'Y' AND poh.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-12-31' GROUP BY pol.item_id, pol.item_description, poh.vendor_id, aps.vendor_name, TO_CHAR(poh.creation_date, 'YYYY-MM') HAVING COUNT(item_id) > 2 order by item_id,vendor_id

[User Question]
List PO numbers and item codes where inspection status is either 'ACCEPTED' or 'REJECTED'.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, rct.inspection_status_code FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.inspection_status_code IN ('ACCEPTED', 'REJECTED')

[User Question]
Find invoices by vendor ID PQR BRS

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE
FROM ap_invoices_all ai
JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID
JOIN hr_operating_units hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE UPPER(s.VENDOR_NAME) LIKE '%PQR%BRS%'
  AND UPPER(hou.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'

list of approvers against specific  invoice */

SELECT       ai.INVOICE_NUM,      aih.APPROVER_NAME AS APPROVER,      aih.RESPONSE,      aih.APPROVER_COMMENTS  FROM       AP_INVOICES_ALL ai          JOIN (          SELECT               INVOICE_ID,               MAX(ITERATION) AS MAX_ITERATION          FROM               AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL          WHERE               INVOICE_ID IN (                  SELECT INVOICE_ID                   FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL                   WHERE INVOICE_NUM = 'abc'              )          GROUP BY INVOICE_ID      ) max_it           ON ai.INVOICE_ID = max_it.INVOICE_ID        JOIN AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL aih           ON aih.INVOICE_ID = max_it.INVOICE_ID          AND aih.ITERATION = max_it.MAX_ITERATION  WHERE       ai.INVOICE_NUM = 'abc'  ORDER BY       aih.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID

[User Question]
Find invoices with outstanding balances grouped by ledger and vendor */

SELECT g.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, s.VENDOR_NAME, SUM(i.INVOICE_AMOUNT - NVL(i.AMOUNT_PAID, 0)) AS OUTSTANDING_BALANCE FROM ap_invoices_all i JOIN ap_suppliers s ON i.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID JOIN gl_ledgers g ON i.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = g.LEDGER_ID WHERE i.INVOICE_AMOUNT > NVL(i.AMOUNT_PAID, 0) GROUP BY g.NAME, s.VENDOR_NAME

[User Question]
Find suppliers and the average unit price of their POs where destination type is 'SHOP FLOOR'.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,        AVG(pla.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla     ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod     ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps     ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'SHOP FLOOR' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and POs where the PO unit price is above 500 in any transaction.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, MAX(rct.po_unit_price) AS max_unit_price FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING MAX(rct.po_unit_price) > 500

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers and total received quantities per item where received > shipped, using CTE and HAVING.*/

WITH received_vs_shipped AS ( SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(rsl.quantity_shipped) AS total_shipped, SUM(rsl.quantity_received) AS total_received FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) ) SELECT * FROM received_vs_shipped WHERE total_received > total_shipped

[User Question]
List suppliers and their total PO count where destination type is 'INVENTORY' and PO unit price is above 1000.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,        COUNT(DISTINCT pha.po_header_id) AS po_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla     ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla     ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod     ON plla.line_location_id = pod.line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps     ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE pod.destination_type_code = 'INVENTORY'   AND pla.unit_price > 1000 GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
List suppliers and POs where cumulative received amount (qty  unit price) is below 10,000 (small orders).*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, SUM(rct.quantity * rct.po_unit_price) AS total_value FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING SUM(rct.quantity * rct.po_unit_price) < 10000

[User Question]
Get a list of items with total shipped quantity using a CTE for latest shipments only.*/

WITH Latest_Shipments AS ( SELECT rsl.shipment_line_id, MAX(rsh.shipped_date) AS latest_ship_date FROM rcv_shipment_headers rsh JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON rsh.shipment_header_id = rsl.shipment_header_id GROUP BY rsl.shipment_line_id ) SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(rsl.quantity_shipped) AS total_shipped FROM Latest_Shipments ls JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON ls.shipment_line_id = rsl.shipment_line_id JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description)

list of prepayment with operating unit and set of books and validation status

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE in ('PREPAYMENT')

Find PO numbers, item codes, and UOM conversion rates where the rate is less than 1 using 5 tables.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, muc.conversion_rate FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id LEFT JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON muc.inventory_item_id = msi.inventory_item_id WHERE muc.conversion_rate < 1

Get suppliers and PO numbers where subinventory is 'QUARANTINE'.*/

[User Question]
List PO numbers and item codes where the invoice status code is 'PENDING'.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code FROM rcv_shipment_headers rsh JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rsh.shipment_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsh.invoice_status_code = 'PENDING'

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID AND UPPER(hou.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME = gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND gp.PERIOD_TYPE = gl.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE AND gp.PERIOD_YEAR = 2007 AND ai.GL_DATE BETWEEN gp.START_DATE AND gp.END_DATE WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'

[User Question]
give the item details of purchaes made under purchaes order no.4683

SELECT aps.vendor_name, ph.segment1 AS po_number, ph.creation_date AS po_creation_date, NVL(msi.segment1, pl.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(pll.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty, pl.unit_price, SUM(pll.quantity * pl.unit_price) AS total_line_amount FROM po_headers_all ph JOIN po_lines_all pl ON ph.po_header_id = pl.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all pll ON pl.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pl.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND pll.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id LEFT JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ph.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE ph.segment1 = '4683' and ph.authorization_status = 'APPROVED' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, ph.segment1, ph.creation_date, NVL(msi.segment1, pl.item_description), pl.unit_price, pl.po_line_id

Find vendors with highest total AWT (withholding tax) across all invoices */

[User Question]
Find fully paid invoices

SELECT 
    ai.INVOICE_NUM,
    ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
    ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
    ai.AMOUNT_PAID,
    s.VENDOR_NAME,
    ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE,
    hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME
FROM 
    ap_invoices_all ai
    JOIN ap_suppliers s 
        ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID
      LEFT JOIN ap_supplier_sites_all ss 
        ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID
     LEFT JOIN hr_operating_units hou 
        ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID
WHERE 
    payment_status_flag = 'Y'

[User Question]
Find POs and their suppliers where more than 3 different units of measure were used, using GROUP BY and HAVING.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT rct.unit_of_measure) AS uom_count FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rct.unit_of_measure) > 3

[User Question]
Calculate vendor-level payment clearing rate in Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' THEN aca.CHECK_ID END) AS CLEARED_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT aca.CHECK_ID) AS TOTAL_COUNT, (COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' THEN aca.CHECK_ID END) / COUNT(DISTINCT aca.CHECK_ID)) * 100 AS CLEARING_RATE FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME

[User Question]
List suppliers and POs where items were delivered with different UOMs than orderd uom*/

SELECT     aps.vendor_name,     pha.segment1 AS po_number,     rsh.shipment_num AS shipment_number,     pla.line_num AS po_line_number,     pla.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE AS po_uom,     rct.UNIT_OF_MEASURE AS receipt_uom,     rct.transaction_id,     rsh.receipt_num,     rct.quantity,     rct.transaction_date    FROM     po_headers_all pha     JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id     JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pla.po_line_id = rct.po_line_id     JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id     JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON rct.shipment_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id WHERE     pla.UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE <> rct.UNIT_OF_MEASURE

Find POs where all shipments have NULL bill of lading numbers.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name HAVING COUNT(CASE WHEN rsh.bill_of_lading IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) = 0

[User Question]
Find suppliers and POs where shipments have more than 2 NULL packing slips.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, count(*) AS null_packing_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_shipment_headers rsh ON pha.po_header_id = rsh.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rsh.packing_slip IS NULL GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING count(*) > 2

[User Question]
item lying in receiving location  by return to receivng without return to supplier for long time over 2 months

WITH return_to_receiving AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtr_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtr_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), return_to_vendor AS ( SELECT po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id, SUM(quantity) AS rtv_qty, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_rtv_date FROM rcv_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' GROUP BY po_distribution_id, shipment_line_id ), returns_combined AS ( SELECT rtr.po_distribution_id, rtr.shipment_line_id, rtr.rtr_qty, rtr.last_rtr_date, NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) AS rtv_qty, rtv.last_rtv_date FROM return_to_receiving rtr LEFT JOIN return_to_vendor rtv ON rtr.po_distribution_id = rtv.po_distribution_id AND rtr.shipment_line_id = rtv.shipment_line_id WHERE NVL(rtr.rtr_qty, 0) - NVL(rtv.rtv_qty, 0) > 0 ) SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date AS po_date, pla.line_num AS po_line_number, pla.item_id, msi.segment1 AS item_code, msi.description AS item_description, pda.distribution_num, rc.rtr_qty AS qty_returned_to_receiving, rc.rtv_qty AS qty_returned_to_vendor, rc.last_rtr_date, rc.last_rtv_date, (NVL(rc.last_rtv_date, SYSDATE) - rc.last_rtr_date) AS days_since_return_to_receiving FROM po_distributions_all pda JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pda.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND msi.organization_id = pda.destination_organization_id JOIN returns_combined rc ON rc.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num

[User Question]
Get list of invoices paid before due date

SELECT ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_DATE, aps.DUE_DATE, aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING, ai.VENDOR_ID, s.VENDOR_NAME, ai.CREATION_DATE AS INVOICE_CREATION_DATE, ai.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS INVOICE_LAST_UPDATE_DATE, aps.PAYMENT_NUM, aip.CREATION_DATE AS PAYMENT_DATE, aps.DUE_DATE - aip.CREATION_DATE AS ADVANCED_DAYS FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_suppliers s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON aps.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID AND aps.PAYMENT_NUM = aip.PAYMENT_NUM JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID WHERE ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL AND ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT > 0 AND aps.DUE_DATE - aip.CREATION_DATE > 0 ORDER BY aps.PAYMENT_NUM, ai.INVOICE_ID, aip.PAYMENT_NUM

List suppliers and total quantity of items returned to vendor in the past year.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, SUM(rct.quantity) AS total_returned FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_headers_all pha ON rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO VENDOR' AND rct.transaction_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
list of invoices not approved even after 10 days from creation date

WITH q1 AS (
    SELECT AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID, 
           AH.RESPONSE, 
           AH.ITERATION, 
           AH.APPROVER_NAME, 
           AH.INVOICE_ID, 
           AH.CREATION_DATE AS ACTION_DATE, 
           AH.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
    FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH
    WHERE AH.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      AND AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID = (
          SELECT MAX(AH2.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID)
          FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH2
          WHERE AH2.INVOICE_ID = AH.INVOICE_ID
            AND AH2.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      )
), 
q2 AS (
    SELECT INVOICE_ID, CREATION_DATE 
    FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL
)
SELECT q2.INVOICE_ID, 
       q2.CREATION_DATE, 
       q1.RESPONSE, 
       q1.ACTION_DATE, 
       q1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS FINAL_APPROVAL_DATE,
       CASE 
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10--x days
           THEN 'Approved but took more than 10 days'
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10 --x days
           THEN 'Pending for more than 10 days'
           ELSE 'Does not meet criteria'
       END AS STATUS
FROM q1 
JOIN q2 ON q1.INVOICE_ID = q2.INVOICE_ID
WHERE (q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)
   OR (q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)

Retrieve items and their PO numbers where shipment unit price is greater than 1000 and less than 5000.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, pha.segment1 AS po_number, rsl.shipment_unit_price FROM rcv_shipment_lines rsl JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rsl.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rsl.shipment_unit_price > 1000 AND rsl.shipment_unit_price < 5000

Get suppliers and total primary quantity delivered where currency code is 'USD'.*/

[User Question]
Retrieve count of distinct items per supplier where the PO was created after 2023.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description)) AS distinct_items FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE pha.creation_date > TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Identify shipments where the number of containers exceeds 10 and materials are still in staging (not delivered).*/

SELECT rsh.shipment_num, aps.vendor_name, SUM(rct.quantity) AS qty_in_staging FROM rcv_shipment_headers rsh JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON rsh.shipment_header_id = rct.shipment_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON rsh.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rsh.num_of_containers > 10 AND rct.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' GROUP BY rsh.shipment_num, aps.vendor_name HAVING SUM(rct.quantity) > 0

getting subledger data having org_id for selected periods by connecting to gl_ledgers

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, pha.creation_date AS po_creation_date, pha.vendor_id, pha.currency_code, pha.rate, pla.item_id, pla.item_description, pla.quantity, pla.unit_price, pda.quantity_ordered, pda.quantity_delivered, pda.quantity_billed, rt.transaction_id, rt.transaction_type, rt.transaction_date, rt.shipment_header_id, rt.shipment_line_id FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_distributions_all pda ON pla.po_line_id = pda.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON rt.po_distribution_id = pda.po_distribution_id JOIN hr_operating_units hu ON hu.organization_id = pha.org_id JOIN gl_ledgers gll ON gll.ledger_id = hu.set_of_books_id JOIN gl_periods glp ON glp.period_set_name = gll.period_set_name AND glp.period_type = gll.accounted_period_type AND glp.period_name = 'Jan-05'  /*Filters GL_PERIODS once instead of using subqueries*/ WHERE rt.transaction_date BETWEEN glp.start_date AND glp.end_date ORDER BY pha.segment1, pla.line_num, pda.distribution_num, rt.transaction_date

[User Question]
List top 3 suppliers by number of PO lines for items with a specific UOM code 'BOX'.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(pla.po_line_id) AS line_count FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN mtl_uom_conversions muc ON msi.inventory_item_id = muc.inventory_item_id WHERE muc.uom_code = 'BOX' GROUP BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY line_count DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

[User Question]
list of invoices not approved even after 10 days from creation date

WITH q1 AS (
    SELECT AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID, 
           AH.RESPONSE, 
           AH.ITERATION, 
           AH.APPROVER_NAME, 
           AH.INVOICE_ID, 
           AH.CREATION_DATE AS ACTION_DATE, 
           AH.LAST_UPDATE_DATE
    FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH
    WHERE AH.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      AND AH.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID = (
          SELECT MAX(AH2.APPROVAL_HISTORY_ID)
          FROM AP_INV_APRVL_HIST_ALL AH2
          WHERE AH2.INVOICE_ID = AH.INVOICE_ID
            AND AH2.HISTORY_TYPE = 'DOCUMENTAPPROVAL'
      )
), 
q2 AS (
    SELECT INVOICE_ID, CREATION_DATE 
    FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL
)
SELECT q2.INVOICE_ID, 
       q2.CREATION_DATE, 
       q1.RESPONSE, 
       q1.ACTION_DATE, 
       q1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE AS FINAL_APPROVAL_DATE,
       CASE 
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10--x days
           THEN 'Approved but took more than 10 days'
           WHEN q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
                AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10 --x days
           THEN 'Pending for more than 10 days'
           ELSE 'Does not meet criteria'
       END AS STATUS
FROM q1 
JOIN q2 ON q1.INVOICE_ID = q2.INVOICE_ID
WHERE (q1.RESPONSE IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (q1.ACTION_DATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)
   OR (q1.RESPONSE NOT IN ('WFAPPROVED', 'MANUALLY APPROVED', 'APPROVED') 
        AND (SYSDATE - q2.CREATION_DATE) > 10)

Retrieve PO numbers, supplier names, and total return quantities using SUM and GROUP BY.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, aps.vendor_name, SUM(rct.quantity) AS total_returned FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_type = 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER' GROUP BY pha.segment1, aps.vendor_name

[User Question]
Report vendor-level cleared payment percentage for Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, (SUM(CASE WHEN aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' THEN aca.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) / SUM(aca.AMOUNT)) * 100 AS CLEARED_PERCENTAGE FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME

[User Question]
Calculate total overdue amount by supplier across Vision Operations  as of today or current or  latest or system date*/

SELECT 
    s.VENDOR_NAME, 
    SUM(aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING) AS TOTAL_OVERDUE 
FROM 
    ap_suppliers s 
JOIN 
    ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID 
JOIN 
    ap_payment_schedules_all aps ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aps.INVOICE_ID 
JOIN 
    hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID 
WHERE 
    aps.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE 
    AND aps.AMOUNT_REMAINING > 0 
    AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'      -- Only approved invoices
    AND AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(
            ai.INVOICE_ID,
            ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT,
            ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG,
            ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE
        ) = 'APPROVED'
    AND ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS IN ('WFAPPROVED','MANUALLY APPROVED','NOT REQUIRED')
    AND ai.CANCELLED_DATE IS NULL  GROUP BY 
    s.VENDOR_NAME 
ORDER BY 
    TOTAL_OVERDUE DESC

List the top 10 most frequently ordered items across all suppliers.*/

SELECT NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM po_lines_all pla LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id GROUP BY NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) ORDER BY order_count DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

Identify suppliers with high mix of currencies (more than 3 currencies) under Vision Operations */

[User Question]
Find vendors with highest cleared payment value over the past year under Vision Operations */

SELECT s.VENDOR_NAME, SUM(aca.AMOUNT) AS CLEARED_AMOUNT FROM ap_suppliers s JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON s.VENDOR_ID = ai.VENDOR_ID JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' AND aca.CHECK_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' GROUP BY s.VENDOR_NAME ORDER BY CLEARED_AMOUNT DESC

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers, item codes, and total received quantities where destination type is 'EXPENSE'.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, SUM(rct.quantity) AS total_received FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.destination_type_code = 'EXPENSE' GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description)

[User Question]
Calculate days between invoice creation and cleared payment for Vision Operations */

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.CREATION_DATE AS INVOICE_DATE, aca.CHECK_DATE, aca.CHECK_NUMBER, (aca.CHECK_DATE - ai.CREATION_DATE) AS DAYS_TO_CLEAR FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.INVOICE_ID = aip.INVOICE_ID JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.CHECK_ID = aca.CHECK_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON ai.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE aca.STATUS_LOOKUP_CODE = 'CLEARED' AND UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%'

[User Question]
give me list of suppllier invoices that are NOT paid before the due date by more than 60 days

SELECT ai.invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, ai.invoice_date, ass.due_date, ass.amount_remaining, ai.vendor_id, aps.vendor_name, ai.creation_date AS invoice_creation_date, ai.last_update_date AS invoice_last_update_date, ass.payment_num, TRUNC(NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE)) AS payment_date, ROUND(NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE) - ass.due_date) AS delayed_days FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON ai.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id JOIN ap_payment_schedules_all ass ON ai.invoice_id = ass.invoice_id LEFT JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ass.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id AND ass.payment_num = aip.payment_num LEFT JOIN ap_checks_all aca ON aip.check_id = aca.check_id WHERE ai.cancelled_date IS NULL and ai.invoice_amount > 0 and ROUND(NVL(aip.creation_date, SYSDATE) - ass.due_date) >60 ORDER BY ass.payment_num, ai.invoice_id, aip.payment_num

Identify top suppliers by total number of payments across all methods in Vision Operations */

[User Question]
List POs, items, and their unit of measure where quantity received exceeds 1000.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, rsl.unit_of_measure, SUM(rsl.quantity_received) AS total_received FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id JOIN rcv_shipment_lines rsl ON pla.po_line_id = rsl.po_line_id GROUP BY pha.segment1, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description), rsl.unit_of_measure HAVING SUM(rsl.quantity_received) > 1000

[User Question]
LSIT OF STANDARD INVOICES FOR THE YEAR 2007

SELECT ai.INVOICE_NUM, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE, s.VENDOR_NAME, ss.VENDOR_SITE_CODE, ai.WFAPPROVAL_STATUS, ai.AMOUNT_PAID, ai.CANCELLED_DATE, ai.GL_DATE, ai.CREATION_DATE, ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT * NVL(ai.EXCHANGE_RATE, 1) base_cur_amt, ai.DESCRIPTION, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE, ai.SOURCE, t.NAME AS TERM_NAME, hou.NAME AS OPERATING_UNIT_NAME, gl.NAME AS LEDGER_NAME, AP_INVOICES_PKG.GET_APPROVAL_STATUS(ai.INVOICE_ID, ai.INVOICE_AMOUNT, ai.PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG, ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE) AS VALIDATION_STATUS FROM AP_INVOICES_ALL ai JOIN AP_SUPPLIERS s ON ai.VENDOR_ID = s.VENDOR_ID LEFT JOIN AP_SUPPLIER_SITES_ALL ss ON ai.VENDOR_SITE_ID = ss.VENDOR_SITE_ID LEFT JOIN AP_TERMS t ON ai.TERMS_ID = t.TERM_ID JOIN HR_OPERATING_UNITS hou ON ai.ORG_ID = hou.ORGANIZATION_ID AND UPPER(hou.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' JOIN GL_LEDGERS gl ON ai.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID = gl.LEDGER_ID JOIN GL_PERIODS gp ON gp.PERIOD_SET_NAME = gl.PERIOD_SET_NAME AND gp.PERIOD_TYPE = gl.ACCOUNTED_PERIOD_TYPE AND gp.PERIOD_YEAR = 2007 AND ai.GL_DATE BETWEEN gp.START_DATE AND gp.END_DATE WHERE ai.INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE = 'STANDARD'

[User Question]
Get the list of payments and advance adjustments against a specific invoice abc123

SELECT ai.invoice_id AS standard_invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, aip.amount AS settlement_amount, aip.accounting_date, TO_CHAR(ap.check_number) AS reference_number, ap.payment_method_lookup_code, 'PAYMENT' AS settlement_type FROM ap_invoices_all ai JOIN ap_invoice_payments_all aip ON ai.invoice_id = aip.invoice_id JOIN ap_checks_all ap ON aip.check_id = ap.check_id WHERE ai.invoice_num = 'abc123' AND ai.cancelled_date IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT ai.invoice_id AS standard_invoice_id, ai.invoice_num, aid.amount AS settlement_amount, aid.accounting_date, ppai.invoice_num AS reference_number, CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR2(30)) AS payment_method, 'PREPAYMENT' AS settlement_type FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all aid JOIN ap_invoices_all ai ON aid.invoice_id = ai.invoice_id JOIN ap_invoice_distributions_all ppd ON aid.prepay_distribution_id = ppd.invoice_distribution_id JOIN ap_invoices_all ppai ON ppd.invoice_id = ppai.invoice_id WHERE aid.line_type_lookup_code = 'PREPAY' AND NVL(aid.reversal_flag, 'N') <> 'Y' AND ai.cancelled_date IS NULL AND ai.invoice_num = 'abc123' ORDER BY accounting_date

[User Question]
Give me the list of items that are frequently purchased say more than once in a month fo the last few months

WITH purchase_data AS (SELECT pol.item_id, pol.item_description, poh.segment1 AS po_number, poh.creation_date, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM poh.creation_date) AS purchase_month, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM poh.creation_date) AS purchase_year FROM po_headers_all poh JOIN po_lines_all pol ON poh.po_header_id = pol.po_header_id WHERE poh.approved_flag = 'Y' AND poh.creation_date BETWEEN DATE '2007-01-01' AND DATE '2007-12-31' /* Only consider approved POs in 2007 */), monthly_purchase_count AS (SELECT item_id, item_description, purchase_month, COUNT(DISTINCT po_number) AS purchase_count FROM purchase_data GROUP BY item_id, item_description, purchase_month /* Count unique POs per item per month */), items_purchased_all_months AS (SELECT item_id, item_description FROM monthly_purchase_count WHERE purchase_count >= 1 /* Change to > 1 for higher frequency */ GROUP BY item_id, item_description HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT purchase_month) = 12 /* Only include items purchased in all 12 months */) SELECT m.item_id, m.item_description, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 1 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jan, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 2 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Feb, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 3 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Mar, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 4 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Apr, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 5 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS May, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 6 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jun, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 7 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Jul, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 8 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Aug, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 9 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Sep, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 10 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Oct, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 11 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Nov, SUM(CASE WHEN m.purchase_month = 12 THEN m.purchase_count ELSE 0 END) AS Dec FROM monthly_purchase_count m JOIN items_purchased_all_months a ON m.item_id = a.item_id GROUP BY m.item_id, m.item_description ORDER BY m.item_id

Find total amount per organization for validated invoices */

SELECT h.NAME AS ORG_NAME, SUM(d.AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all d JOIN ap_invoices_all i ON d.INVOICE_ID = i.INVOICE_ID JOIN hr_operating_units h ON i.ORG_ID = h.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE UPPER(h.NAME) LIKE '%VISION%OPERATIONS%' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ap_invoice_distributions_all WHERE INVOICE_ID = i.INVOICE_ID AND MATCH_STATUS_FLAG = 'N') GROUP BY h.NAME

[User Question]
Find PO lines with the highest unit price per supplier using ROW_NUMBER and 6 tables.*/

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number, pla.po_line_id, pla.unit_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY pla.unit_price DESC) AS rn FROM po_lines_all pla JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id JOIN po_distributions_all pod ON pla.po_line_id = pod.po_line_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND pod.destination_organization_id = msi.organization_id ) WHERE rn = 1

[User Question]
Get suppliers, items, and PO numbers where total delivered quantity is greater than total ordered.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,        NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,        pha.segment1 AS po_number,        plla.quantity_received AS delivered_qty,        plla.quantity AS ordered_qty FROM po_headers_all pha      JOIN po_lines_all pla          ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id      JOIN po_line_locations_all plla          ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id      JOIN ap_suppliers aps          ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id      LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi          ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id         AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE plla.quantity_received > plla.quantity

Find average invoice amount under 'Vision Operations' by ledger */

Retrieve suppliers and POs where at least one transaction was corrected using EXISTS and subquery.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM rcv_transactions rct WHERE rct.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id AND rct.transaction_type = 'CORRECT' )

[User Question]
Retrieve suppliers and POs where transactions involve both 'RECEIVE' and 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER' types for the same PO.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 AS po_number FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN rcv_transactions rct ON pha.po_header_id = rct.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rct.transaction_type IN ('RECEIVE', 'RETURN TO SUPPLIER') GROUP BY aps.vendor_name, pha.segment1 HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT rct.transaction_type) = 2

[User Question]
PO Receipt Delays by Vendor with Custom Threshold (30 Days)

SELECT aps.vendor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT pha.segment1) AS delayed_pos, AVG(rt.transaction_date - pll.promised_date) AS avg_days_delayed, SUM(pla.quantity) AS total_ordered_quantity, SUM(rt.quantity) AS total_received_quantity FROM po_headers_all pha JOIN po_lines_all pla ON pha.po_header_id = pla.po_header_id JOIN po_line_locations_all pll ON pla.po_line_id = pll.po_line_id JOIN rcv_transactions rt ON pll.line_location_id = rt.po_line_location_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id WHERE rt.transaction_type = 'RECEIVE' AND pha.approved_flag = 'Y' AND (rt.transaction_date - pll.promised_date) > 30 GROUP BY aps.vendor_name ORDER BY avg_days_delayed DESC

[User Question]
Retrieve the average PO unit price per supplier and item category using 6 tables and GROUP BY.*/

SELECT aps.vendor_name,          NVL (msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code,          cat.segment1 AS category,          AVG (pla.unit_price) AS avg_price     FROM po_lines_all pla          JOIN po_headers_all pha             ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id          JOIN po_line_locations_all plla             ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id          LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi             ON     pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id                AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id          JOIN ap_suppliers aps             ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id          LEFT JOIN mtl_item_categories mic             ON msi.inventory_item_id = mic.category_id             and mic.category_set_id = 27             join mtl_categories cat on mic.category_id = cat.category_id GROUP BY aps.vendor_name,          NVL (msi.segment1, pla.item_description),          cat.segment1

[User Question]
Retrieve PO numbers, item codes, and supplier names for transactions where the accrual status code is 'NOT ACCRUED'.*/

SELECT pha.segment1 AS po_number, NVL(msi.segment1, pla.item_description) AS item_code, aps.vendor_name FROM rcv_transactions rct JOIN po_lines_all pla ON rct.po_line_id = pla.po_line_id JOIN po_headers_all pha ON pla.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id JOIN ap_suppliers aps ON pha.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN po_line_locations_all plla ON pla.po_line_id = plla.po_line_id LEFT JOIN mtl_system_items_b msi ON pla.item_id = msi.inventory_item_id AND plla.ship_to_organization_id = msi.organization_id WHERE rct.accrual_status_code = 'NOT ACCRUED'
